What does it mean to "be Brain"? The Brain pillars How to invest with Brain Brainvest Team Manifesto

THE BRAIN PILLARS

  • VISION

    Taking care of the future of our clients.

  • MISSION

    3Ps BRAINVEST Protect and preserve today to provide tomorrow.

  • VALUES

    Ethics is the basis to everything that leads to honesty. Without honesty there is no transparency. Transparency is essential in order to have trust. And when there is trust, it is known that discretion is essential to sustainable and enduring relations.

KNOW THE KEY-BRAINS

  • FREEDOM

    100% INDEPENDENT. We receive only from our clients. We work only for them. Having only one source of delivery gives us total freedom to choose the best ways for them.

  • EMPATHY

    It is not enough to look for the best solutions for our clients, we need to be in their shoes. Understand their goals, anxieties, dreams. We do not only invest capital as if it were ours, but we invest as if we were them.

  • INTELLIGENCE

    We are not called Brain without a reason. The best of our intelligence is that there is no formatting. We are multi-plural. With a diverse and differentiated team, we manage to compose the best solutions for Capital Preservation.

  • THE EYE THAT SEES IT ALL

    Unlike a private banking from a large institution that sees only inside it, we can see all the investments, analyze them and find the best one for our client.

  • TRUST

    It is said that trust is something that one doesn't get, but one loses. For us, trust is essential for the development of our job. And we really look after it because as we do not like to lose money, it is the same concerning trust itself.

  • HUMBLENESS

    As Socrates, we know that we know nothing. And we look daily for better opportunities according to the evolution of the market to offer to our clientele. We always want to learn. And always evolve.

  • RESPECT

    Just like trust, a relation without respect cannot be called a relationship. We respect each other and we are also respected.

  • FOCUS

    We have only one focus: you. And there is nothing that can be done to divert our attention.

  • DISCRETION

    We are so discreet that we are known for our invisibility.

Brainvest
Team
